common.title: Hourly Weather
common.description: A card to render hourly weather conditions as a bar.

editor.name: Name (Optional)
editor.segments_to_show: Number of forecast segments to show (Optional)
editor.offset: Number of forecast segments to offset start by (Optional)
editor.icons: Show icons instead of text labels
editor.label_spacing: Number of forecast segments to space time and temperature labels by (Optional)
editor.barb_speed_and_direction: As wind barb, speed, and direction

errors.too_many_segments_requested: Too many forecast segments requested in num_segments. Must be <= number of segments in forecast entity.
errors.must_be_int: Must be an even integer greater than or equal to 2
errors.invalid_colors: The following colors in your configuration are invalid:
errors.offset_must_be_positive_int: offset must be a positive integer
errors.no_wind_barbs_with_string_bearing: Wind barbs are not supported when weather entity uses cardinal directions for wind bearing.
